dict.acceptation: 政治，政治学；政治活动，政治斗争；政纲，（个人的）政见；经营，管理；

sent.trans: 我搞的政治活动是清白的政治活动。

sent.orig: Politics is war carried out without bloodshed, while war is politics carried out with bloodshed.
sent.trans: 毛泽东：政治是不流血的战争，战争是流血的政治。

sent.orig: It refers to relationships at politics, economic, military and culture in the category of politics.
sent.trans: 它概指英美两国在国际政治范畴内的政治、经济、军事、文化等关系。

sent.orig: The party politics is developing with the process of the democracy and modernization of politics.
sent.trans: 政党政治是伴随着民主政治的发展和政治现代化产生并发展的。

sent.orig: Partisan politics is often an obstruction to good government. Office politics are often debilitating and counterproductive.
sent.trans: 党羽的政治阴谋经常是良好政府的妨碍。
